name: All Hell Breaks Loose
description:
All Hell Breaks Loose is a game where YOU create the bullet hell. Miss your shots? Watch out for the bullets it creates!

Controls: 
WSAD to move

LShift to dash

F to use powerups (watch out! Some powerups damage you :) )

LMB or Space to shoot

Credits:

slyvr89 - Coding/Design/SFX

FegNiwtons - Art, Animation, Design

DJCommits - Coding/Design

Music links:
